name: SWAM
description:
SWAM is a Story based Platformer. Experience action packed, fast flowing platformer.
Play as Blob and escape the evil clutches of a robotic mom.
Find new friends, explore an expansive environment, fight terrifying enemies.

  • 40 Thrilling Levels
  • Unlockable Characters
  • Collect Vops And Spend them
  • Multiple Endings
